span(anchor#format). ~

h1(blue). Format

h3. Vendors

|_. {{ site.format.header.field_name }} |_. {{ site.format.header.description }} |_. {{ site.format.header.type }} |_. {{ site.format.header.values }} |_. {{ site.format.header.default }} |_. {{ site.format.header.non_editable }} |
| id | Code | {{ site.format.type.long }} |  | Generated by the system |=. {{ site.format.non_editable }} |
| type | Company or Individual | {{ site.format.type.long }} | 1: Company
2: Individual | {{ site.format.mandatory }} |  |
| full_name | The full name of this customer | {{ site.format.type.string }} | {{ site.format.read_only }} | {{ site.format.non_available }} |=. {{ site.format.non_editable }} |
| address | Main address | {{ site.format.type.address }} |  | An empty address |  |
| phone_number | Phone Number | {{ site.format.type.string64 }} |  | Empty string |  |
| email | Email address | {{ site.format.type.string255 }} |  | Empty string |  |
| website | Website URL | {{ site.format.type.string255 }} |  | Empty string |  |
| contacts | List of this vendor's contact | {{ site.format.type.contact }} |  | No Contact |=. {{ site.format.non_editable }} |
| currency_iso_code | Currency | {{ site.format.type.string4 }} | ISO Code from "your Currencies":/docs/1.0/api/currency/#currencies_get | Your domain main currency |  |
| payment_terms_id | Payment Terms | {{ site.format.type.long }} | IDs from "Payment terms":/docs/1.0/api/payment_term/#payment_terms_get | Due on receipt |  |
| taxpayer_id_number | Taxpayer ID Number | {{ site.format.type.string64 }} |  | Empty String |  |
| user_code | Vendor Number | {{ site.format.type.string64 }} | Anything that does not already
belongs to a vendor | Generated by the system |  |
| notes | Notes | {{ site.format.type.text }} |  | Empty String |  |

h3. Company only

|_. {{ site.format.header.field_name }} |_. {{ site.format.header.description }} |_. {{ site.format.header.type }} |_. {{ site.format.header.values }} |_. {{ site.format.header.default }} |_. {{ site.format.header.non_editable }} |
| company_name | Company Name | {{ site.format.type.string255 }} |  | {{ site.format.mandatory }} |  |

h3. Individual only

|_. {{ site.format.header.field_name }} |_. {{ site.format.header.description }} |_. {{ site.format.header.type }} |_. {{ site.format.header.values }} |_. {{ site.format.header.default }} |_. {{ site.format.header.non_editable }} |
| first_name | First Name | {{ site.format.type.string255 }} |  | Empty String |  |
| last_name | Last Name | {{ site.format.type.string255 }} |  | {{ site.format.mandatory }} |  |
| middle_name | Middle Name | {{ site.format.type.string255 }} |  | Empty String |  |


span(anchor#vendor_get). ~

h2(blue). GET vendors/:id

p. Returns all the information about the customer or lead.

h3. Resource Information

* Rate limited: Yes
* Authentication: Required
* HTTP Methods: GET
* Response Format: JSON

h3. Example Request

{% highlight bash %}
curl -X GET {{ site.api.base_url }}{{ site.api.v1}}{{ site.resource.vendors.url}}/:id {{site.api.auth_pattern}}
{% endhighlight %}

p. JSON response sample (Company)

{% highlight bash %}
{
  "id": 132,
  "type": 1,
  "full_name": "Regular Vendor",
  "address": {
    "label1": "Regular street",
    "label2": "Block G",
    "label3": "Floor 5",
    "zip_code": "77 837",
    "city": "San Francisco",
    "country": "USA",
    "localisation": "California",
    "short_localisation": "CA",
    "full_address": "Regular street Block G Floor 5 San Francisco CA 77 837 USA"
  },
  "phone_number": "555 7890 888",
  "email": "regular.vendor@gmail.com",
  "website": "regularvendor.com",
  "contacts": [
    {
      "id": 65,
      "first_name": "Regular",
      "last_name": "Vendor",
      "full_name": "Regular Vendor",
      "cell_number": "",
      "work_phone": "888 7654 333",
      "home_phone": "",
      "email": "r.vendor@mail.com",
      "address": {
        "label1": "",
        "label2": "",
        "label3": "",
        "zip_code": "",
        "city": "",
        "country": "",
        "localisation": "N/A",
        "short_localisation": "N/A",
        "full_address": ""
      },
      "notes": "This contact is pretty regular."
    }
  ],
  "currency": "USD",
  "payment_terms_id": 1,
  "taxpayer_id_number": "SE OIU 90",
  "user_code": "SUP-002",
  "notes": "This vendor is pretty regular.",
  "company_name": "Regular Vendor"
}
{% endhighlight %}


span(anchor#vendor_put). ~

h2(blue). PUT vendors/:id

p. Update a single customer or lead.

h3. Resource Information

* Rate limited: Yes
* Authentication: Required
* HTTP Methods: PUT
* Body Format: JSON
* Response Format: JSON
* Non editable fields: id, full_name

h3. Example Request

{% highlight bash %}
curl -X PUT {{ site.api.base_url }}{{ site.api.v1}}{{ site.resource.vendors.url}}/:id {{site.api.auth_pattern}} -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -T fieldsToUpdate.json
{% endhighlight %}

p. JSON response

The up-to-date JSON of the vendor you've just modfied.


span(anchor#vendor_delete). ~

h2(blue). DELETE vendors/:id

p. Deletes a single vendor. Also delete all of his contacts.

h3. Resource Information

* Rate limited: Yes
* Authentication: Required
* HTTP Methods: DELETE
* Response Format: JSON

h3. Example Request

{% highlight bash %}
curl -X DELETE {{ site.api.base_url }}{{ site.api.v1}}{{ site.resource.vendors.url}}/:id {{site.api.auth_pattern}}
{% endhighlight %}

p. JSON response

The JSON of the vendor you've just deleted.


span(anchor#vendors_get). ~

h2(blue).  GET vendors

p. Returns the list of all your vendors.

h3. Resource Information

* Rate limited: Yes
* Authentication: Required
* HTTP Methods: GET
* Body Format: JSON
* Response Format: JSON

h3. Example Request

{% highlight bash %}
curl -X GET {{ site.api.base_url }}{{ site.api.v1}}{{ site.resource.vendors.url}} {{site.api.auth_pattern}}
{% endhighlight %}

p. JSON response

The list of all your vendors, in a JSON format.


span(anchor#vendors_post). ~

h2(blue). POST vendors

p. Create a single vendor.

h3. Resource Information

* Rate limited: Yes
* Authentication: Required
* HTTP Methods: POST
* Body Format: JSON
* Response Format: JSON
* Mandatory fields : type, company_name (for Company)/last_name (for Individual)

h3. Example Request

{% highlight bash %}
curl -X POST {{ site.api.base_url }}{{ site.api.v1}}{{ site.resource.vendors.url}} {{site.api.auth_pattern}} -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -T newVendor.json
{% endhighlight %}

p. JSON response

The complete JSON of the vendor, as it was created by the system.
